level.heading: Establishment of the District of Columbia Health and Hospitals Public Benefit Corporation.
Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary addition of chapter, see note to § 44-1101.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-212, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 44-1101.01.

Law 13-91, the "Technical Amendments Act of 1999," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-435, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 2, 1999, and December 7, 1999, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 29, 1999, it was assigned Act No. 13-234 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-91 became effective on April 12, 2000.
For D.C. Law 14-18, see notes following § 44-401.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Chief Procurement Officer qualification: Section 2(c) of D.C. Law 12-xxx (D.C. Act 12-249) provided that nothing in that act shall affect the operations of the District of Columbia Health and Hospitals Public Benefit Corporation pursuant to this chapter.
